seo.title: Join the HY-Motion Pro Waitlist | Game-Ready AI Animations
seo.description: Get early access to HY-Motion Pro. Unlock auto-retargeting to FBX, Unreal Engine & Unity support, cloud asset library, and extended animation duration.

title: Turn Raw AI Motion into Game Assets
description: Stop struggling with raw BVH files. Join the waitlist for HY-Motion Pro to unlock automated pipelines, commercial licensing, and seamless integration with your favorite 3D engines.
formSubtitle: Join the waitlist today and get 20% off your first month when we launch.

features.name: Auto-Retargeting to FBX
features.description: Instantly convert raw motion data into standard .FBX files compatible with Mixamo, Unreal Engine 5 (Manny/Quinn), and Unity Humanoid.

features.name: Cloud Asset Library
features.description: Never lose a generation. Save your history, organize animations into project folders, and build a persistent motion repository in the cloud.

features.name: Extended Duration & Quality
features.description: Unlock the limit. Generate longer, smoother animation sequences with higher framerates and advanced motion smoothing algorithms.

features.name: Batch Generation
features.description: Need crowd animations? Generate multiple variations of a prompt in a single click to populate your scenes faster.
